content: A few of us doing compiler development would like offer an interactive "office-hours" style forum to chat and answer questions about Roc, and to help unblock you on any Roc projects you may be working on! If this is something you may be interested in, we'll have the first one 12:30 PM - 2 PM EST on March 20. The meeting link is https://meet.jit.si/roc-office-hours, and I've attached an ics to this message. roc-office-hours-20220320.ics
@Folkert de Vries and I are online now if anyone is interested!
